meanings.definition: The quality of being able to be processed.
meanings.sent1: The processability of the data made it easy to analyze.
meanings.sent2: The processability of the fabric allowed for smooth manufacturing.
meanings.sent3: The processability of the dough made baking cookies a breeze.
meanings.sent4: The processability of information in the digital age is like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The processability of the material was so efficient that the project finished ahead of schedule.

meanings.definition: The ability to undergo a series of actions or steps to achieve a desired result.
meanings.sent1: The processability of the software ensured a seamless user experience.
meanings.sent2: The processability of the ingredients in the recipe was crucial for the dish.
meanings.sent3: The processability of the puzzle made it fun to solve.
meanings.sent4: The processability of ideas in a brainstorming session is like connecting puzzle pieces.
meanings.sent5: The processability of the plan led to a successful outcome.
